title: Help-Attempting to reconnect bug!
body: Ok so after the patch 4.2.1 i have been having issues with playing the game, I have one name where i play with the normal 60 fps and 50 ping but the game after that i have a attempting reconnect appear on my screen for now apparent reason. I try restarting my PC but nothing happens just the same thing very rarely the attempting to reconnect bar disappears but my fps jumps from 6-16 and that's all it stays at. I've tried everything to fix this but nothing has worked. I constantly play League of Legends and this is kind of upseting that i cant continue playing it over my summer break.{{item:3070}}
